entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. High 15. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to periods of rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
